word_mean: 溶解：一物质溶解于另一物质的过程
分解：化合物经化学作用分离为其组分

sentence.Network_en: Politicians say it could lead to a dissolution of parliament.
sentence.Network_cn: 政客们说这可能会导致议会解散。

sentence.Network_en: He stayed on until the dissolution of the firm in 1948.
sentence.Network_cn: 他一直呆到1948年公司解散。

sentence.Network_en: the dissolution of barriers of class and race
sentence.Network_cn: 阶级和种族隔阂的消除

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... dissolve v 溶解；分解 dissolution n 溶解；毁灭 insolvent a 无力偿还的.
会计方面专业术语的英文翻译_百度文库 ... dishonoured check 退票 dissolution 解散 dividend 股利.
赵丽——GRE词汇课 - 豆丁网 ... dis- 1 . 分开 dissolution n 分解 distribution 分发 2. 否定.
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... dissension 意见不合 dissolution 解除 dissolve 溶解;取消.

list.abs: dissoluble 可溶的dissolution basin 溶蚀盆地dissolution of a joint venture 合营企业解散
dissolubility 溶解度dissolution system 药物溶解仪dissolvent 溶剂，溶媒

fractional decomposition 分级分解fractional dissolution 分级溶解fractional distillation 分馏

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin dissolutio(n-), from the verb dissolvere (see dissolve)

entry.def: Dissolution is the act of breaking up officially an organization or institution, or of formally ending a parliament.

example.ex: He stayed on until the dissolution of the firm in 1948...
example.tran: 他一直呆到 1948 年公司解散。

example.ex: Politicians say it could lead to a dissolution of parliament.
example.tran: 政客们说这可能会导致议会解散。

entry.tran: (商业协议的)终止;(婚姻关系的)解除
entry.def: Dissolution is the act of officially ending a formal agreement, for example a marriage or a business arrangement.

example.ex: ...the statutory requirement for granting dissolution of a marriage.
example.tran: 准予婚姻关系解除的法律规定

entry.def: Dissolution is a process in which something becomes weaker and then disappears.

means.word_mean: 1. the process of going into solution;

stems_affixes.word_buile: re再+solu溶解,解决,松开+te→adj.坚决的,果断的
solu溶解,解决,松开+able可以……的→soluble可溶的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 绝对的,完全的;确实的,肯定的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ab相反,不+solu溶解,解决,松开+te→绝不松开的→绝对的
ab离开+solu溶解,解决,松开+tion表名词→松开后离开
dis分开+solu溶解,解决,松开+tion表名词→松开分散→解散
solu溶解,解决,松开+te→n.溶解物, 溶质

sentences.en: The churches consociated to fight their dissolution.
sentences.cn: 教会联合起来对付他们的分裂行动。
